data.eml:eml: Annotated Checklist of Chinese Cladocera (Crustacea: Branchiopoda). Part II. Order Anomopoda (families Macrotrichidae, Eurycercidae and Chydoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ji, Gao-Hua, Xiang, Xian-Fen, Chen, Shou-Zhong, Yu, Gong-Liang, Kotov, Alexey A., Dumont, Henri J. (2015): Annotated Checklist of Chinese Cladocera (Crustacea: Branchiopoda). Part II. Order Anomopoda (families Macrotrichidae, Eurycercidae and Chydoridae). Zootaxa 4044 (2): 241-269, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4044.2.4
